languages.text: Адептус Механикус обеспокоены вспышкой ереси, произошедшей на Кьяве Гамма. Они готовы заключить торжественный союз с династией фон Валанциус, согласно которому в древнем, законсервированном по приказу Леди Теодоры цеху будет основан приорат скитариус, фабрика по производству непобедимых Тех-стражей . Эти суровые воины, чьи цифровые обеты не знают изъяна, возьмут под охрану все объекты Механикус в протекторате.

traits.locale_text: Заключить торжественный союз с АдМехами, по которому они развернут на Кьяве фабрику подготовки скитариев.

languages.text: The Adeptus Mechanicus are concerned about the recent outbreak of heresy on Kiava Gamma. They offer to enter into a solemn alliance with House von Valancius. Under its terms, an ancient workshop preserved by Lady Theodora's order will become the site of a Prioratus Skitarius, a factory which would produce the invincible Tech-Guards. These unrelenting warriors, impeccable in their digital vows, will secure every Adeptus Mechanicus facility in the protectorate.
languages.original_text: Адептус Механикус обеспокоены вспышкой ереси, произошедшей на Кьяве Гамма. Они готовы заключить торжественный союз с династией фон Валанциус, согласно которому в древнем, законсервированном по приказу Леди Теодоры цеху будет основан приорат скитариус, фабрика по производству непобедимых Тех-стражей . Эти суровые воины, чьи цифровые обеты не знают изъяна, возьмут под охрану все объекты Механикус в протекторате.

traits.locale_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus are concerned about the recent outbreak of heresy on Kiava Gamma. They offer to enter into a solemn alliance with House von Valancius. Under its terms, the preserved ancient workshop of Null Khalif will become the site of a Prioratus Skitarius, a factory producing the invincible Tech-Guards. These dour warriors, impeccable in their digital vows, will secure every Mechanicus facility in the trade empire.

These dour warriors, impeccable in their digital vows, will secure every Mechanicus facility in the trade empire.

These unrelenting warriors, impeccable in their digital vows, will secure every Mechanicus facility in the trade empire.

The Adeptus Mechanicus are concerned about the recent outbreak of heresy on Kiava Gamma. They offer to enter into a solemn alliance with House von Valancius. Under its terms, an ancient workshop preserved by Lady Theodora's order will become the site of a Prioratus Skitarius, a factory which would produce the invincible Tech-Guards. These unrelenting warriors, impeccable in their digital vows, will secure every Adeptus Mechanicus facility in the protectorate.

languages.text: El Adeptus Mechanicus está preocupado por el reciente brote de herejía en Kiava Gamma. Se ofrecen a entrar en una alianza solemne con la casa von Valancius. Según los términos que proponen, un antiguo taller preservado por orden de lady Theodora se convertirá en la sede de un Prioratus Skitarius, una fábrica que producirá a los invencibles tecnoguardias. Estos guerreros incansables con juramentos digitales inquebrantables protegerán todas las instalaciones del Adeptus Mechanicus en el protectorado.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus are concerned about the recent outbreak of heresy on Kiava Gamma. They offer to enter into a solemn alliance with House von Valancius. Under its terms, an ancient workshop preserved by Lady Theodora's order will become the site of a Prioratus Skitarius, a factory which would produce the invincible Tech-Guards. These unrelenting warriors, impeccable in their digital vows, will secure every Adeptus Mechanicus facility in the protectorate.

traits.locale_text: El Adeptus Mechanicus está preocupado por el reciente brote de herejía en Kiava Gamma. Se ofrecen a entrar en una alianza solemne con la casa von Valancius. Según los términos que proponen, un antiguo taller preservado por orden de lady Theodora se convertirá en la sede de un Prioratus Skitarius, una fábrica que producirá a los invencibles tecnoguardias. Estos guerreros incansables con juramentos digitales inquebrantables protegerán todas las instalaciones del Adeptus Mechanicus en el protectorado.

languages.text: L'Adeptus Mechanicus se préoccupe de la recrudescence des incidents hérétiques sur Kiava Gamma. Ses membres se proposent de fonder une alliance solennelle avec la maison von Valancius. Elle serait régie par les termes suivants : un atelier ancien préservé sur ordre de dame Théodora deviendra le site d'un Prioratus Skitarius, une usine de fabrication des invincibles technogardes. Ces guerriers implacables, aux vœux numériques au-dessus de tout soupçon, assureront la sécurité des installations de l'Adeptus Mechanicus aux quatre coins du protectorat.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus are concerned about the recent outbreak of heresy on Kiava Gamma. They offer to enter into a solemn alliance with House von Valancius. Under its terms, an ancient workshop preserved by Lady Theodora's order will become the site of a Prioratus Skitarius, a factory which would produce the invincible Tech-Guards. These unrelenting warriors, impeccable in their digital vows, will secure every Adeptus Mechanicus facility in the protectorate.

traits.locale_text: L'Adeptus Mechanicus se préoccupe de la recrudescence des incidents hérétiques sur Kiava Gamma. Ses membres se proposent de fonder une alliance solennelle avec la maison von Valancius. Elle serait régie par les termes suivants : un atelier ancien préservé sur ordre de dame Théodora deviendra le site d'un Prioratus Skitarius, une usine de fabrication des invincibles technogardes. Ces guerriers implacables, aux vœux numériques au-dessus de tout soupçon, assureront la sécurité des installations de l'Adeptus Mechanicus aux quatre coins du protectorat.

languages.text: 机械修会对基亚瓦伽马星最近越发严重的异端倾向表示担忧。他们提议，与冯·瓦兰修斯家族缔结庄严的盟约。根据盟约条款，他们将获得过去曾由西奥多拉夫人的船员占领的作坊，将这篇作坊改造为护教军的工厂，用来生产无坚不摧的技术守卫。这些英勇无畏的战士将会坚守数字誓约，确保王朝内每处机械修会设施的安全。
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus are concerned about the recent outbreak of heresy on Kiava Gamma. They offer to enter into a solemn alliance with House von Valancius. Under its terms, an ancient workshop preserved by Lady Theodora's order will become the site of a Prioratus Skitarius, a factory which would produce the invincible Tech-Guards. These unrelenting warriors, impeccable in their digital vows, will secure every Adeptus Mechanicus facility in the protectorate.

traits.locale_text: 机械修会对基亚瓦伽马星最近越发严重的异端倾向表示担忧。他们提议，与冯·瓦兰修斯家族缔结庄严的盟约。根据盟约条款，他们将获得过去曾由西奥多拉夫人的船员占领的作坊，将这篇作坊改造为护教军的工厂，用来生产无坚不摧的技术守卫。这些英勇无畏的战士将会坚守数字誓约，确保王朝内每处机械修会设施的安全。

languages.text: 帝国技術局はキアヴァ・ガンマで最近発生した異端を懸念している。彼らはフォン・ヴァランシウス家と厳粛な同盟を結ぶことを申し出た。その条件の下で、レディ・シオドーラの修道会が保存している古代の工房をプリオラトゥス・スキタリウスの敷地とし、無敵のテック・ガードを生産する工場としている。デジタル的な誓約を駆使した瑕疵なき戦士たちは、保護領内のすべての帝国技術局の施設を守ることになるだろう。
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus are concerned about the recent outbreak of heresy on Kiava Gamma. They offer to enter into a solemn alliance with House von Valancius. Under its terms, an ancient workshop preserved by Lady Theodora's order will become the site of a Prioratus Skitarius, a factory which would produce the invincible Tech-Guards. These unrelenting warriors, impeccable in their digital vows, will secure every Adeptus Mechanicus facility in the protectorate.

traits.locale_text: 帝国技術局はキアヴァ・ガンマで最近発生した異端を懸念している。彼らはフォン・ヴァランシウス家と厳粛な同盟を結ぶことを申し出た。その条件の下で、レディ・シオドーラの修道会が保存している古代の工房をプリオラトゥス・スキタリウスの敷地とし、無敵のテック・ガードを生産する工場としている。デジタル的な誓約を駆使した瑕疵なき戦士たちは、保護領内のすべての帝国技術局の施設を守ることになるだろう。

languages.text: Die Adeptus Mechanicus sind besorgt ob des jüngsten Zuwachses an Ketzerei auf Kiava Gamma. Sie bieten an, eine düstere Allianz mit Haus Valancius zu schließen. Eine uralte Werkstatt, die auf Befehl von Lady Theodora bewahrt wurde, soll unter diesem Pakt zum Standort eines Prioratus Skitarius werden, einer Fabrik, welche die unbesiegbaren Tech-Wachen produziert. Diese gnadenlosen Krieger, unerschütterlich in ihrem digitalen Eid, schützen jede Anlage der Adeptus Mechanicus im Protektorat.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus are concerned about the recent outbreak of heresy on Kiava Gamma. They offer to enter into a solemn alliance with House von Valancius. Under its terms, an ancient workshop preserved by Lady Theodora's order will become the site of a Prioratus Skitarius, a factory which would produce the invincible Tech-Guards. These unrelenting warriors, impeccable in their digital vows, will secure every Adeptus Mechanicus facility in the protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Die Adeptus Mechanicus sind besorgt ob des jüngsten Zuwachses an Ketzerei auf Kiava Gamma. Sie bieten an, eine düstere Allianz mit Haus Valancius zu schließen. Eine uralte Werkstatt, die auf Befehl von Lady Theodora bewahrt wurde, soll unter diesem Pakt zum Standort eines Prioratus Skitarius werden, einer Fabrik, welche die unbesiegbaren Tech-Wachen produziert. Diese gnadenlosen Krieger, unerschütterlich in ihrem digitalen Eid, schützen jede Anlage der Adeptus Mechanicus im Protektorat.

languages.text: Adeptus Mechanicus, yakın zamanda Kiava Gama'da patlak veren bir kâfirlik vakasından endişe ediyor. Kendileri, von Valancius Hanesi'yle ciddi bir müttefiklik kurmak istediklerini belirttiler. Bu müttefiklikle birlikte Leydi Theodora'nın emri doğrultusunda korunmuş olan kadim bir atölye, yenilmez Tekno Muhafızların üretileceği Prioratus Skitarius denen fabrikaya ev sahipliği yapacak. Dijital yeminlerinde kusur etmeyip yılmak nedir bilmeyen bu savaşçılar, protektoradaki tüm Adeptus Mechanicus tesislerini koruyacak.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus are concerned about the recent outbreak of heresy on Kiava Gamma. They offer to enter into a solemn alliance with House von Valancius. Under its terms, an ancient workshop preserved by Lady Theodora's order will become the site of a Prioratus Skitarius, a factory which would produce the invincible Tech-Guards. These unrelenting warriors, impeccable in their digital vows, will secure every Adeptus Mechanicus facility in the protectorate.
